title: hygrothermal data
description: Humidity needs to be handled properly to create sustainable buildings with high comfort. This schema is used to exchange hygrothermal data which can be used for hygrothermal simulations.

id.description: The id represents the hygrothermal data set.

name.description: If the hygrothermal data set has a name, it can be indicated here.

explanation.description: This string can explain humans the hygrothermal data set.

warnings.description: Some hygrothermal data may easily be misinterpreted. The warnings contain critical information for users to avoid typical mistakes.

origin.description: For traceability, the origin of the data can be defined.

approvals.description: If the hygrothermal data is approved by stakeholders, a signature can be provided.

created.description: When the hygrothermal data was created.

valid.description: From when and until when the data is valid.
